This app designed for use with Kaiya wire Temperature Sensor. So make sour that you already has the sensor before download this app. Buy sensor contact kaiya.phamacy@gmail.com

Key features of this app 
 - display real-time temperature and humidity update rate up to type of sensor (1-60 times per sec.)
 - show data in number and graphs.
 - show history data in graph.
 - print graph history data
